description: The Tokiwadai Middle School principal`s grandson, a level 4. Seemingly romantically interested in Misaka. It is later revealed that Mitsuki`s place was in reality taken by Etzali, an Aztecan sorcerer who planned to place mistrust between Touma and his friends and allies. However, the real Mitsuki appeared and his cover was blown.
name: Unabara Mitsuki
